title: Thoughts on the future with George McRobie
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Colin Low and Roger Hart
brief_description: George McRobie, from Britain’s Intermediate Technology Group, and environmental specialists from Canadian universities, government and industry, discuss changes they foresee in the treatment of the Earth’s resources and the responsibility that falls to technology in making the world a better place to live. Some ecology-protective progress is illustrated in the film by engineers, and much more is promised for the future.
